code: protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     return createSpringCamelContext(this, "org/apache/camel/spring/processor/interceptSendToEndpointDynamic.xml"). }

@Test public void testInterceptFile() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:intercepted").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:first", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testNoInterceptFile() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:intercepted").expectedMessageCount(0).     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:second", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
